Unknown.translation: Just as seeing a lamp lit in the dark, several moths start rumbling around it like warp and weft.

Unknown.translation: Just as sweetmeats kept in best possible way to protect them from encroachers, yet avarice bewitched ants reach it from all sides.

Unknown.translation: Similarly, an obedient Sikh who is accepted (by the Guru) and in whose mind the words and knowledge of the True Guru the supreme treasure, gets lodged, that Sikh's feet are bowed at by the whole world.  (606)
